                                                            thori@csuchico.eduChat With Us!We are excited to share information about the Chico Experience with you and answer your questions! Send us an email and/or schedule a Zoom meeting - whichever works best for you.  Some topics we are experts on: living on and off campus, getting involved in clubs and activities, the university classroom experience, working on campus, and so much more!Join a Video ChatPlease use this link to meet the ambassador with whom you have scheduled a Zoom meeting. The Zoom room will be empty if you join without scheduling a meeting first. Use the time zone converter below to help ensure you meet at the agreed upon time.  Join Zoom Drop-in(opens in new window)Time Zone Converter(opens in new window)HolidaysAmbassadors may not respond during holidays when the university is closed. For the 2022-23 academic year, those days include:July 4September 5 November 11November 24-25December 19-January 16 (winter break)March 13-17 (spring break)March 31May 29International Education & Global EngagementStudent Services Center, Room 440+1-530-898-5415iege@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/iegeDivisions of IEGEInternational AdmissionsInternational Student & Scholar ServicesStudy Abroad & ExchangeESL Support ServicesFaculty ResourcesInternational Training Programs
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
